charges.charge_description: 18:641 THEFT/EMBEZZLEMENT OF U. S. PROPERTY-Did willfully and wrongfully steal and purloin goods and property of the United States (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant placed on supervised probation for one year with standard and special conditions; to pay a fine of $100.00 and special assessment of $25.00 in monthly installments of at least $20.00, perform 100 hours of community service and take care of any outstanding obligations in any other court, each condition to be satisfied within the first six months of supervision. (1)
